latter unconscious that he was be- ing reflected in the hussar officer as in a look- ing glass started, moved forward, and an- swered: "Highly satisfied, your excellency!" 
"We all have our weaknesses," said Kutuzov smiling and walking away from him. "He used to have a predilection for Bacchus." 
The regimental commander was afraid he might be blamed for this and did not answer. The hussar at that moment noticed the face of the red-nosed captain and his drawn-in stom- ach, and mimicked his ex
